fields.description:
As a follow-up to EUCA-12481 - there are debug messages that are not useful for triage or any other purpose in the cloud-debug.log files on the UFS for federated setups.  Below is the output from two separate UFS hosts that are part of a federated setup:
{code}
[root@g-08-01 ~]# grep -i "No such user" /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log* | head -10
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.10:Tue Nov 15 18:45:23 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.06] com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.10:Tue Nov 15 18:45:23 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.06] Error occurred looking for account by canonical ID 44561d1581f513c421a2838214a0e12e39283d41273e3523341a25c5c4f544e0 with exception com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabaseAuthProvider.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(DatabaseAuthProvider.java:488) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.Accounts.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(Accounts.java:140) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabasePrincipalProvider.lookupAccountIdentifiersByCanonicalId(DatabasePrincipalProvider.java:198) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.identity.IdentityService.describeAccounts(IdentityService.java:226) |
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.10:Tue Nov 15 18:45:23 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.06] com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.10:Tue Nov 15 18:45:23 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.06] Error occurred looking for account by canonical ID 44561d1581f513c421a2838214a0e12e39283d41273e3523341a25c5c4f544e0 with exception com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabaseAuthProvider.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(DatabaseAuthProvider.java:488) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.Accounts.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(Accounts.java:140) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabasePrincipalProvider.lookupPrincipalByCanonicalId(DatabasePrincipalProvider.java:142) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.identity.IdentityService.describePrincipal(IdentityService.java:144) |
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.10:Tue Nov 15 18:45:23 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.06] com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.10:Tue Nov 15 18:45:23 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.06] Error occurred looking for account by canonical ID 44561d1581f513c421a2838214a0e12e39283d41273e3523341a25c5c4f544e0 with exception com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabaseAuthProvider.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(DatabaseAuthProvider.java:488) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.Accounts.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(Accounts.java:140) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabasePrincipalProvider.lookupPrincipalByCanonicalId(DatabasePrincipalProvider.java:142) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.identity.IdentityService.describePrincipal(IdentityService.java:144) |
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.10:Tue Nov 15 19:09:07 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.07] com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.10:Tue Nov 15 19:09:07 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.07] Error occurred looking for account by canonical ID 44561d1581f513c421a2838214a0e12e39283d41273e3523341a25c5c4f544e0 with exception com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabaseAuthProvider.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(DatabaseAuthProvider.java:488) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.Accounts.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(Accounts.java:140) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabasePrincipalProvider.lookupAccountIdentifiersByCanonicalId(DatabasePrincipalProvider.java:198) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.identity.IdentityService.describeAccounts(IdentityService.java:226) |
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.10:Tue Nov 15 19:09:07 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.07] com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.10:Tue Nov 15 19:09:07 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.07] Error occurred looking for account by canonical ID 44561d1581f513c421a2838214a0e12e39283d41273e3523341a25c5c4f544e0 with exception com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabaseAuthProvider.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(DatabaseAuthProvider.java:488) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.Accounts.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(Accounts.java:140) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabasePrincipalProvider.lookupPrincipalByCanonicalId(DatabasePrincipalProvider.java:142) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.identity.IdentityService.describePrincipal(IdentityService.java:144) |

[root@h-02 ~]# grep -i "No such user" /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log* | head -10
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.3:Wed Nov 16 20:56:34 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.26] com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.3:Wed Nov 16 20:56:34 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.26] Error occurred looking for account by canonical ID 374e4e434f50405f4a301c6042144121544524426056b1241cb373644b181f2e with exception com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabaseAuthProvider.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(DatabaseAuthProvider.java:488) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.Accounts.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(Accounts.java:140) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabasePrincipalProvider.lookupPrincipalByCanonicalId(DatabasePrincipalProvider.java:142) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.identity.IdentityService.describePrincipal(IdentityService.java:144) |
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.3:Wed Nov 16 20:56:35 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.26] com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.3:Wed Nov 16 20:56:35 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.26] Error occurred looking for account by canonical ID 374e4e434f50405f4a301c6042144121544524426056b1241cb373644b181f2e with exception com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabaseAuthProvider.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(DatabaseAuthProvider.java:488) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.Accounts.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(Accounts.java:140) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabasePrincipalProvider.lookupPrincipalByCanonicalId(DatabasePrincipalProvider.java:142) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.identity.IdentityService.describePrincipal(IdentityService.java:144) |
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.3:Wed Nov 16 20:56:35 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.26] com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.3:Wed Nov 16 20:56:35 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.26] Error occurred looking for account by canonical ID 374e4e434f50405f4a301c6042144121544524426056b1241cb373644b181f2e with exception com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabaseAuthProvider.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(DatabaseAuthProvider.java:488) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.Accounts.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(Accounts.java:140) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabasePrincipalProvider.lookupPrincipalByCanonicalId(DatabasePrincipalProvider.java:142) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.identity.IdentityService.describePrincipal(IdentityService.java:144) |
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.3:Wed Nov 16 20:56:35 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.26] com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.3:Wed Nov 16 20:56:35 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.26] Error occurred looking for account by canonical ID 374e4e434f50405f4a301c6042144121544524426056b1241cb373644b181f2e with exception com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabaseAuthProvider.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(DatabaseAuthProvider.java:488) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.Accounts.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(Accounts.java:140) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabasePrincipalProvider.lookupPrincipalByCanonicalId(DatabasePrincipalProvider.java:142) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.identity.IdentityService.describePrincipal(IdentityService.java:144) |
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.3:Wed Nov 16 20:56:35 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.26] com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user
/var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-debug.log.3:Wed Nov 16 20:56:35 2016 DEBUG [DatabaseAuthProvider:Identity.26] Error occurred looking for account by canonical ID 374e4e434f50405f4a301c6042144121544524426056b1241cb373644b181f2e with exception com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such user | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabaseAuthProvider.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(DatabaseAuthProvider.java:488) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.Accounts.lookupAccountByCanonicalId(Accounts.java:140) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.persist.DatabasePrincipalProvider.lookupPrincipalByCanonicalId(DatabasePrincipalProvider.java:142) | com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.identity.IdentityService.describePrincipal(IdentityService.java:144) |
{code}

Per EUCA-12481, this output is expected, but shouldn't be logged as a DEBUG message.
fields.summary: Useless IAM DEBUG messages displayed on federated setups

comments.body:
In addition to the reported issue you should no longer see debug messages from DatabaseAuthProvider for the following commands:

{code}
#
# euare-userlistbypath --as-account foo
euare-userlistbypath: error (NotAuthorized): Can not find delegation account foo
#
#
# euare-userlistbypath --as-account 123123123123
euare-userlistbypath: error (NotAuthorized): Can not find delegation account 123123123123
#
{code}

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.4.0-0.25812.163.20170303gitb711a30.el7}}

*Steps*

# Deploy two Eucalyptus VPC clouds:
#* [hspencer-529-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/529/]
#* [hspencer-540-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/540/]
# Set up federation between both clouds:
{code}
[root@a-34-l ~]# euca-describe-regions
REGION	region-one	http://ec2.d-25.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	region-two	http://ec2.e-13.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/

[root@d-11 ~]# euca-describe-regions
REGION	region-one	http://ec2.d-25.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	region-two	http://ec2.e-13.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
{code}
# Create non-eucalyptus account (example {{development-operations}}) via {{euare-accountcreate}} and confirm federation is operational:
{code}
[root@a-34-l ~]# euare-accountcreate -a development-operations -w > .euca/devops-admin.ini
[root@a-34-l ~]# euca-describe-regions --region devops-admin@region-one
REGION	region-one	http://ec2.d-25.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	region-two	http://ec2.e-13.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
[root@a-34-l ~]# euca-describe-regions --region devops-admin@region-two
REGION	region-one	http://ec2.d-25.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	region-two	http://ec2.e-13.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/

## Bundle, upload, register EMI in non-native region ##
[root@a-34-l ~]# euca-install-image -i xenial-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw -b ubuntu-xenial-x86_64-hvm-20170308 -n ubuntu-xenial-x86_64-hvm --arch x86_64 --virtualization-type hvm --region devops-admin@region-two
...
/var/tmp/bundle-AHBuKA/xenial-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.part.28 100% |=============================================================|   8.60 MB  13.71 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
/var/tmp/bundle-AHBuKA/xenial-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.manifest.xml 100% |========================================================|   6.37 kB  16.17 kB/s Time: 0:00:00
IMAGE	emi-8d260d1d
[root@a-34-l ~]# euca-modify-image-attribute -l -a all emi-8d260d1d --region devops-admin@region-two
launchPermission	emi-8d260d1d	ADD	Group	all
{code}
# Check both regions to confirm message doesn't show up in cloud logs on UFSs and CLCs:
{code}
## Region One ##
[root@a-34-l ~]# grep DatabaseAuthProvider /var/log/eucalyptus/*
[root@a-34-l ~]# ssh 10.111.5.144 "grep DatabaseAuthProvider /var/log/eucalyptus/*"
[root@a-34-l ~]# ssh 10.111.5.158 "grep DatabaseAuthProvider /var/log/eucalyptus/*"
[root@a-34-l ~]# ssh 10.111.5.160 "grep DatabaseAuthProvider /var/log/eucalyptus/*"
[root@a-34-l ~]#

## Region Two ##
[root@d-11 ~]# grep DatabaseAuthProvider /var/log/eucalyptus/*
[root@d-11 ~]# ssh 10.111.5.107 "grep DatabaseAuthProvider /var/log/eucalyptus/*"
[root@d-11 ~]#
{code}
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
